mapper.select: select song_id,title,file_path,duration,artist,uploaded_at,album,cover_image from songs where title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or artist like concat('%',#{query},'%')

select songs.song_id, title, file_path, duration, artist, uploaded_at, album, cover_image from songs join playlist_songs on songs.song_id = playlist_songs.song_id where playlist_id = #{id} order by playlist_songs.added_at desc
